Pan Africanist Student Movement of Azania (PASMA) bụ òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eme mgbanwe nke amụrụ na Mahadum nke Western Cape, Cape Town, South Africa
E hiwere ya na afọ 1989 dị ka "Pan Africanist Student Organisation of Azania" (PASO) na Roodepoort, Johannesburg
N'etiti ndị guzobere ya bụ Lungelo Mbandazayo (Onye isi ala) na Lawrence "General" Nqandela (Secretary General), bụ ndị duziri Pan Africanist Congress of Azania youth wing.
